title: Even the Mini iPods Suck
body: I've mentioned previously that the original <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2003/11/24/iPod_sucks.aspx">iPods sucked</a>, and <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/03/19/iPod_still_sucks.aspx">still sucks</a>.  Today I came across <a href="http://channel9.msdn.com/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=7082#7082">a post on Channel 9</a> telling how the Mini iPod also sucks.  Can Apple get anything right?
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-05-13
